```{r echo=FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
```

The package comes with a couple of datasets:

    - shoemaker2015

# Time-course data of mice lung samples exposed to different influenza strains

```{r}
library(moanin)
data(shoemaker2015)

data = shoemaker2015$data
meta = shoemaker2015$meta
```

Here's the firt 10 lines of the data named `matrix`
```{r echo=FALSE}
data = data[1:10, ]
meta = meta[1:10, ]
kable(data) %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed", "responsive"))
```

and the first 10 lines of the metadata `data.frame`.
```{r echo=FALSE}
kable(meta) %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed", "responsive"))
```
